pages.headline: 9' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Kenny puts Celtic ahead with a goal in the 10th minute! Hatate provides the assist, and Kenny finishes with a left-footed shot to the bottom left corner. Celtic leads 1-0 against Kilmarnock.

pages.headline: 50' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 2, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: What a strike from Kieran Tierney! The Celtic left-back unleashed a powerful left-footed shot from outside the box, finding the bottom right corner. Liam Scales provided the assist as Celtic extend their lead to 2-0 against Kilmarnock.

pages.headline: 84' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 3, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Daizen Maeda scores for Celtic! The Japanese forward places the ball in the bottom right corner with his right foot. Arne Engels provided the assist with a precise through ball.

pages.headline: 86' CHANCE! -- Attempt saved
pages.caption: Daizen Maeda (Celtic) attempts a shot from outside the box, assisted by Anthony Ralston. Kilmarnock goalkeeper Eddie Beach saves the shot in the centre of the goal. The save occurs in the 87th minute.

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY MISSED! -- Penalty conceded by James Brown (Kilmarnock) after a foul in the penalty area
pages.caption: Drama at the death! James Brown concedes a penalty in the 92nd minute. Can Celtic capitalize on this late opportunity?

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY! -- Penalty Celtic
pages.caption: Celtic gets a penalty in the dying moments of the game! Yang Hyun-Jun was brought down in the box. Can they convert and grab a late winner?

pages.headline: 92' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption:
Goal! Arne Engels seals the deal for Celtic, converting a penalty in stoppage time.
Celtic extends their lead to 4-0 against Kilmarnock.
Engels's right-footed shot finds the bottom left corner, leaving the keeper with no chance.
